== QT Themes without KDE ==
To change the appearance of QT applications you must use the ''qtconfig'' program.  install both  ''qt3-qtconfig'' and the  ''qt4-gtconfig'' package which is available in the Universe Repository.

Then to access qt configuration panel just go to '''System->Preference>Qt3 Configuration or Qt4 Configuration''' depending on which one you want to use.
